sen.j: 雅（みやび、まさ〔名乗り〕）とは、上品で優雅なこと。
sen.e: Miyabi or Masa (in case of name) means sophisticated and graceful.
Miyabi or Masa (in case of name) means sophisticated and graceful.
Miyabi or Masa (in case of name) means sophisticated and graceful.

sen.j: 宮廷風・都会風であること。
sen.e: Courtly and urban.
Courtly and urban.
Courtly and urban.
And fine appearance.
And fine appearance.
And fine appearance.

sen.j: - 女性に対しては「みやび」と訓読みで、男性に対しては「まさ」と音読みで、それぞれ命名される場合が比較的多い。
sen.e: 雅 is used for personal names relatively often and read "Miyabi" for female names in Japanese reading and "Masa" for male names in phonetic reading.
sen.cmt: 漢字そのものの読みが話題となるため漢字で表記しました。
sen.e: 雅 is used for personal names relatively often and read "Miyabi" for female names in Japanese reading and "Masa" for male names in phonetic reading.
雅 is used for personal names relatively often and read 'Miyabi' for female names in Japanese reading and 'Masa' for male names in phonetic reading.
Trade names
Trade names
Trade names

tit.cmt: 原文にならい漢字と読みを両方表記しました。

sen.j: - かつて販売されていたタバコの銘柄。
sen.e: A brand name of cigarette sold before.
A brand name of cigarettes once sold.
A brand name of cigarettes once sold.

sen.j: - かつて日本国有鉄道に存在した和風客車の愛称。
sen.e: A nickname of Japanese style passenger car that existed in Japanese National Railways before.
A nickname of Japanese style passenger car that was once used by Japanese National Railways.
A nickname of Japanese style passenger car that was once used by Japanese National Railways.
